mapper.select: select tag_value from gg_tag t, gg_trip_tag tr where t.tag_id=tr.tag_id and tr.tb_no=#{num}
mapper.update: update gg_tb_board set tb_v_count=tb_v_count+1 where tb_no=#{tb_no}
mapper.insert: insert into gg_trip_board (tb_no, user_id, tb_title, tb_content, tb_reg_date, tb_v_count, tb_m_num, tb_notice, tb_talk) values(SEQ_GG_TRIP_BOARD_TB_NO.nextval, #{user_id}, #{tb_title}, #{tb_content}, sysdate, #{tb_v_count}, #{tb_m_num}, #{tb_notice}, #{tb_talk})
mapper.select: select user_name from gg_user where user_id=#{id}
select user_id from gg_user where user_name=#{user_name}
